page.title: 11Employment Survey
page.content:
The children in class 8 of Osmondthorpe Primary School collected information about employment in our area. The information was to do with the jobs of fathers, mothers and older brothers and sisters of working age. A small number of these people worked outside the survey areaa but they all lived within it. The information was collected at the end of May 1985.
Unemployed ----- 37% Housewives ----- 21% Retail ----- 13% Clothing ----- 8% Office ----- 4% Catering ----- 4% Building ----- 2% Driving ----- 2% Railway ----- 2% Motor Trade----- 2% Miscellaneous 4%
